body.name: Dreo Smart Wall Heater, Electric Space Heater for Bedroom 1500W, 120° Vertical Oscillation, Adjustable Thermostat, Remote Control, 24H Timer, Easy-Mount Heater for Indoor Use, Works with Alexa, WH719S

features: Widespread Warmth: Dreo's 120° wide oscillation heating distributes warm air evenly from top to bottom, helping to bring fast heat to every corner of your room more efficiently than regular wall-mounted heaters.

Smart Control, Seamless Lifestyle: Schedule room heating hours to match your routine, access your heater settings from anywhere with the Dreo app, or even use your voice to control it thanks to Alexa and Google Home compatibility.

Fast and Accurate Temperature Control: Set the room temp as you like, choose from 41 to 95°F range with an unprecedented 1°F accuracy. Dreo's PTC ceramic space heater brings fast and steady heating for an exceptional comfort experience.

Ready for a Good Night Sleep: This smart heater for bedroom automatically adjust its LED panel brightness to low-light conditions, while it delivers warmth with lower noise, making sure nothing interrupts your sleep.

Hassle-free Installation, Stress-free Maintenance: Get your space heater mounted easily. The package comes with all accessories including a convenient drilling guide with easy to follow steps. Keeping your wall-mounted heater like new is super convenient thanks to its reusable filter and detachable design.

Heating Coverage: To ensure maximum warmth and comfort, use as a primary heat source for 200 sq. ft. areas, or up to 750 sq. ft. as a supplementary source. Check if your room has proper insulation for optimum efficiency.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Heater and easy Mounting
reviews.reviewText: This heater is in my office room that doesn’t have a vent, about 180 sq ft. It heats up the entire room in about 8-10 minutes, very sleek looking and the app is great, the Alexa compatibility is a plus for me since I can ask her to prep the office room and it gets it to a nice warm temp. Very accurate temperature sensor and the mounting is very straightforward and even brings a mini level to make sure it’s straight.Definitely recommend, looks amazing and functions amazingly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is being used to heat our kitchen and it works great! Once you figure out the hieroglyphs on the remote you will be off and running. It’s easy to operate and does a great job heating the area. It is quiet and attractive. Enjoy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely love this heater!
reviews.reviewText: Uber quick delivery and easy insulation. Supplied template is really great. A day hasn’t gone by without one of us saying I just love this new heater. S set it for the temperature you want and it keeps it there. Easy Peezy. Open door or window feature is really handy. Wi-Fi set up with Alexa is the easiest of any device I’ve ever used. Awesome design and on and on great little heater. Use it in a 500 square-foot Hospice room by the way. Very quiet at first and second speed. Reasonably white noise at speed H3. It don’t look back..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's only been a week, but I have to say, I'm very impressed so far. I'll get the bad(or at least, the not great things) out of the wag first. The touch controls are a little off putting. I do appreciate the simplicity and minimalist look, but cramming that many functions into so few controls gets a little confusing. I'm also a not a big fan of the fact that Alexa won't let me group this with my nest thermostat to match the temperature in the house. And while that's more of a knock on Amazon and Alexa than it is dreo, it still needs to be noted.That said! I'm really into this thing. Our stairway to the second floor has no heat, and a GIANT old window. So it's very cold. On top of that, the two bedrooms up there are very big, and only have 1 vent each. So the cold stairway only makes it harder to hest those rooms. Ever since we added this to the stairway though, both the stairways and bedrooms have become noticeably warmer and more comfortable. The oscillating blower is perfect for what we need. I have it mounted over the stairs on the ledge and it's able to blow heat down the stairs and to the hall at the top at the same time.The app is great, and makes up for the clunky and complicated controls. Setting a schedule for the week to match the one we have for the house only took about 5 minutes. And while I am a little bummed about the grouping issue in Alexa, I'm very impressed by how much control over this Alexa DOES have. Most 3rd party devices have only very basic controls, this gives much more(though not as much as the dreo app does).Like I said, it's only been a week. But so far in beyond satisfied with the product. Absolutely recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing products and the best customer support I’ve ever experienced! Highly recommend!!
reviews.reviewText: Ordered this Dreo wall heater through Amazon instead of their website (Dreo.com; Which if you order through Dreos website you can get 18% off which Amazon doesn’t offer; as of today of this review). Works amazing for my 250 sq ft room. Was having problems with the internal dreo thermostat matching the ambient temperature, which you can calibrate it, and getting the unit to update. I reached out to customer support(Spoke to Tina and Jennifer through email; very wonderful and helpful) and not only did they give amazing support to help solve my problems, they sent a replacement dreo wall heater, and one of their Dreo air circulator fans for my troubles. Instead of them just throwing out random answers for support, they took the time to ask questions and verify your problems with pictures and videos if possible, so they can accurately give you the correct support needed, so their not wasting your time. I would recommend this wall heater to anyone. Able to set schedules, use your phone anywhere, any time to operate or adjust your heater. The heater doesn’t use a lot of energy either, I check my electric app everyday and haven’t noticed a huge increase in power consumption (KWH). In ECO mode, the unit will turn on and off once reaching set temperature to save you power. It’s small but mighty! Super safe around kids and pets and way lower chances for a fire. Best heater purchase. Attached are pictures of the heater and the problem i was having with the thermostat. THE BEST CUSTOMER SERVICE IVE EVER EXPERIENCED WITH A COMPANY. I highly recommend this company to everyone for their products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Although it's not white, like I thought, very impressed. (Face is silver, color means didly to me) It doesn't feel cheap, at all. Feels solid. Super quiet, heats fast, and performs well. Looks way better than what I was expecting.If I have the need for another space heater, I know without a doubt what I'll be ordering again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We've purchased three of these, two for ourselves and a third for a family member because we liked them so much. We have a split level house, and despite central heat, the lower level is always quite a bit colder. Our main bedroom and my office/family room and on the lower level and it's always fairly chilly down there in the winter. We put one in each of the two large rooms downstairs, and they heat the rooms up quickly. The remote is great, but the app has many more programming options. The display lights are can be set to turn mostly off, it still puts out a little light but not enough to really bother us at night. They're much lighter than anticipated and easy to hang on the wall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This heater can work magic. I have a 2 and a half car garage that needs some heating for my 3d printing hobby and it delivered more than expected. Using the app is fun as well and easy to use. I live in the Midwest and just recently had some below freezing weather and it was able to keep the garage at 52degrees when the weather outside was around -20. If needed I’ll be buying another one for my shed. Great purchase
Me encantó, lo instale en un espacio amplio próximo a una doble altura, y si ayuda muy bien a templar el espacio.
